content: It would be nice if the methods in the C# Library that create OperationOutcome resources - ForException() and ForMessage() - had an additional parameter to request that a text element is populated with the relevant message. That would save me (and others?) a few lines of code and remove a number of warning messages from my test platform of choice.
That sounds like some form of narrative generator...
I've been thinking of adding an interface definition for that in the core libs.
Then can have various implementations of it. Hardcoded, configured with Razor etc.
